name: Temple of Darkness (Bardon)
description:
After a Long while on the monastry you come back to your hometown. But you are surprised, all your Friends went to Zombies and you try to Escape. At the end of town you meet the Barkeeper, he tells you that the Evil god Baal is behind this tragedy. After this you go to the "Temple of Darkness" and fight his servants. In the third Level you must fight against Baal...

You move with the arrowkeys. arrow up + space is a kick. But the best attack is your magic fist, arrow down.
